info.title: Broadage API
info.description: This document describes the `BroadageService` service and all its corresponding RPCs.

v1ActionCode.description:
CODE represents the code of an action in a match.

 - ACTION_CODE_UNSPECIFIED: ACTION_CODE_UNSPECIFIED represents an unspecified action.
 - ACTION_CODE_POINTS: ACTION_CODE_POINTS represents a points action.
 - ACTION_CODE_FOUL: ACTION_CODE_FOUL represents a foul action.
 - ACTION_CODE_RECEIVE: ACTION_CODE_RECEIVE represents a receive action.
 - ACTION_CODE_REBOUND: ACTION_CODE_REBOUND represents a rebound action.
 - ACTION_CODE_ASSIST: ACTION_CODE_ASSIST represents an assist action.
 - ACTION_CODE_TURNOVER: ACTION_CODE_TURNOVER represents a turnover action.
 - ACTION_CODE_STEAL: ACTION_CODE_STEAL represents a steal action.
 - ACTION_CODE_BLOCK: ACTION_CODE_BLOCK represents a block action.
 - ACTION_CODE_SWAP: ACTION_CODE_SWAP represents a swap action.
 - ACTION_CODE_TIMEOUT: ACTION_CODE_TIMEOUT represents a timeout action.

v1ActionSubcode.description:
SUB_CODE represents the sub-code of an action in a match.

 - ACTION_SUBCODE_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED represents an unspecified sub-code.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_IN_ARC: IN_ARC represents an action inside the arc.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_OUT_ARC: OUT_ARC represents an action outside the arc.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_FREE_THROW: FREE_THROW represents a free throw action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_DUNK: DUNK represents a dunk action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_OFFENSIVE_REBOUND: OFFENSIVE_REBOUND represents an offensive rebound action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_DEFENSIVE_REBOUND: DEFENSIVE_REBOUND represents a defensive rebound action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_RECEIVE_BLOCK: RECEIVE_BLOCK represents a block received action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_RECEIVE_FOUL: RECEIVE_FOUL represents a foul received action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_TECHNICAL: TECHNICAL represents a technical foul action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_UNSPORTSMANLIKE: UNSPORTSMANLIKE represents an unsportsmanlike foul action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_DISQUALIFYING: DISQUALIFYING represents a disqualifying foul action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_BRAWL: BRAWL represents a brawl action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_SWAP_IN: SWAP_IN represents a swap in action.
 - ACTION_SUBCODE_SWAP_OUT: SWAP_OUT represents a swap out action.

type.description: type is the type of the Actor.

fid.description: fid is the unique identifier of the Actor when the actor type is player or team.

v1Actor.description: ActorType represents the type of Actor.

v1ActorType.description:
Actor represents the type of Actor in a match.

 - ACTOR_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED represents an unspecified actor type.
 - ACTOR_TYPE_PLAYER: PLAYER represents a player in the match.
 - ACTOR_TYPE_TEAM: TEAM represents a team in the match.
 - ACTOR_TYPE_COACH: COACH represents a coach in the match.

v1EventCode.description:
EventCode represents the type of event in a match.

 - EVENT_CODE_UNSPECIFIED: UNSPECIFIED represents an unspecified event.
 - EVENT_CODE_SOM: SOM represents the start of the match.
 - EVENT_CODE_EOM: EOM represents the end of the match.
 - EVENT_CODE_SOQ: SOQ represents the start of a quarter.
 - EVENT_CODE_EOQ: EOQ represents the end of a quarter.

subCode.title:
For some action kinds, sub_code specifies additional data,
as for the case of POINTS action, in which case sub_code specifies
if the points were scored by a free, in-arc or out-arc throw

value.title:
For some action kinds, value specifies the action value,
as in the case of POINTS action, in which case
value specifies the action score (1, 2 or 3 points)

result.title:
For some action kinds, result specifies the action result,
as in the case of POINTS action, in which case
result specifies if the points were scored or not
